 2007-01812007-02-15HEALTH,  ,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS (GLAZED CERAMICS AND GLASSWARE) REGULATIONS by lowering the limits on the amount of lead and cadmium that may be released from the lip and rim areas of a drinking vessel with a distinctive exterior decorative pattern located within 20 mm or less of the rim.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0030 Publication Date: 2007-03-07
